attributes.action: Increase the amount a married couple can have invested for income, so they can recieve low income benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when income from under £70000 investment, together with gov. pension,can result in having a weekly income of £203 for a couple,should not that couple be given benefits to help them have an income in line with recomended minimum. They have to pay full council rates, full dental costs.
